thread.title: Ukrainians stronger than any circumstances - Zelensky
thread.title_full: Ukrainians stronger than any circumstances - Zelensky

author: @ukrinform
title: Ukrainians stronger than any circumstances - Zelensky
text: Ukrainians stronger than any circumstances - Zelensky Ukrinform Ukraine must win the war so that Russian evil will forever remember that it will never make any territorial gains. President Volodymyr Zelensky emphasized this in an evening video [address ](https://t.me/V_Zelenskiy_official/9240)to the nation, Ukrinform reports. "Today, Ukraine remembers the defenders of Donetsk airport – one of those battles that determined our modern history," the president said. “Ukrainians are stronger than any circumstances,” he stressed. [Britain has stood with Ukraine since very outset of war - Zelensky](/rubric-polytics/3816089-britain-has-stood-with-ukraine-since-very-outset-of-war-zelensky.html) At the same time, Zelensky noted that both the state and its people should be aware of this strength. "And we must win in this war. For our people, for our state, for the Russian evil to forever remember that it will never gain anything more," the president stressed. As Ukrinform reported earlier, President Volodymyr Zelensky foresaw new defense aid packages from international partners.
